title: About Us
headline: Our mission
disconnect: We all create more and better pictures than ever, but they remain trapped in our devices. Wall display has always been the best setting to enjoy personal and decorative images on a daily basis, but there is a disconnect:

photographyTraditional.title: Traditional picture framing
photographyTraditional.line2: Let's frame it for years to come

reimagining.title: Time for a re-imagining...
reimagining.description: Our mission is to make it as easy as possible to get a feed of fresh photos and digital art from your smartphone or camera to the walls in your home. Not with yet more glaring screens and power cords, but with high quality natural materials and a mobile-first, on-demand workflow.

joinUs.title: Join us!
joinUs.description: Wundershine is growing fast and we're looking for brilliant people who get excited when art meets technology. If you'd like to contribute to our mission, please reach out via careers@wundershine.com.

press.title: Press
